001package edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.hilt;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import androidx.room.Room;
005import androidx.room.RoomDatabase;
006import dagger.Module;
007import dagger.Provides;
008import dagger.hilt.InstallIn;
009import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
010import dagger.hilt.components.SingletonComponent;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.dao.LocationDao;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.dao.UserDao;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.service.LeaveMeAloneDatabase;
014import javax.inject.Singleton;
015
016/**
017 * Uses Dagger {@link Provides @Provides}-annotated methods to satisfy dependencies on concrete
018 * implementations of {@link LeaveMeAloneDatabase} and {@link UserDao}.
019 */
020
021@InstallIn(SingletonComponent.class)
022@Module
023public class LeaveMeAloneDatabaseModule {
024
025  LeaveMeAloneDatabaseModule() {
026    // Package-private constructor to avoid automatic HTML documentation generation.
027  }
028
029  @Provides
030  @Singleton
031  LeaveMeAloneDatabase provideLocalDatabase(@ApplicationContext Context context) {
032    return Room
033        .databaseBuilder(context, LeaveMeAloneDatabase.class, LeaveMeAloneDatabase.NAME)
034        .addCallback(new LeaveMeAloneDatabase.Callback())
035        .build();
036  }
037
038  @Provides
039  UserDao provideUserDao(LeaveMeAloneDatabase database) {
040    return database.getUserDao();
041  }
042
043  @Provides
044  public LocationDao providesLocationDao(LeaveMeAloneDatabase database) {
045    return database.getLocationDao();
046  }
047
048  // TODO Add additional methods so satisfy dependencies on other DAO interface implementations.
049
050}
